participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is a friendly and caring person, always looking out for her siblings and making time for her pets.
participant_1.background: i have one brother. i have three sisters. i love dogs. i live in alabama.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is nurturing and compassionate, dedicated to his job and enjoys family time as well as leisurely reading.
participant_2.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.
